    • Student

      public Student(String name, String email, String password, boolean advisingHold)
      Constructs a Student with specified details.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the student
      email - the email of the student
      password - the password of the student
      advisingHold - the advising hold status of the student

  • Method Details

    • setAdvisingHold

      public void setAdvisingHold(boolean advisingHold)
      Sets the advising hold status for the student.
      Parameters:
      advisingHold - the new advising hold status

    • enroll

      public boolean enroll(CourseSection course)
      Attempts to enroll the student in a course section. Enrollment is denied if the student has an advising hold, is already enrolled in another section of the same course, or if there is a time conflict with an existing course.
      Parameters:
      course - the course section to enroll in
      Returns:
      true if enrollment is successful, false otherwise

    • drop

      public boolean drop(CourseSection course)
      Drops the student from a course. Dropping is unsuccessful if the student is not enrolled in the course.
      Parameters:
      course - the course to drop
      Returns:
      true if dropping is successful, false otherwise

    • viewSchedule

      public void viewSchedule()
      Displays the student's schedule, organized by day of the week.

    • viewEnrolledCourses

      public void viewEnrolledCourses()
      Displays the list of courses the student is enrolled in as a formatted table.

    • printClassesForDay

      public void printClassesForDay(DayOfWeek day, int courseColWidth, int timeColWidth)
      Prints the classes for a specific day of the week.
      Parameters:
      day - the day of the week
      courseColWidth - the width of the course column
      timeColWidth - the width of the time column

    • getEnrolledCourses

      public List<CourseSection> getEnrolledCourses()
      Returns the list of courses the student is enrolled in.
      Returns:
      the list of enrolled courses

    • hasAdvisingHold

      public boolean hasAdvisingHold()
      Checks if the student has an advising hold.
      Returns:
      true if the student has an advising hold, false otherwise
